v1.ujze2EjImBy8ctjB.content: Gosh, I'm finally out of this hellhole. Where the hell is Max when you need him?

v1.4FofuXbNdeKf4ofo.content: Oh, hey! I don't think we've met before.

v1.vQkVx1oUSfC7Ovl4.content: Pleased to meet you. I'm Vick!

v1.zo70LIdHmstP0Wp_.content: I work the performance around this place. Can't say it's easy with that idiot Max messing around...

v1.0ONAGNqCeqtZsxSj.content: I was working on upgrading the software of our quarantine. Making it faster, also applying security patches.

v1.rdcYHvhrgYDdPMmR.content: Good software doesn't come easy these days, you know.

v1.gQ-kruQnJUhn8vMP.content: May I ask, what brings you here?

questions.content: I discovered your radio protocol and heard your distress message.
I heard your screams when I was chilling with Coco over there.

v1.mJoQvIceZdeb8Vn8.content: We never intended the radio protocol to be used by anyone other than us treefolk. Yet here you are.

v1.IdXu5-rR7AyrWjpZ.content: Well. Might as well have a little chat while we're at it!
